description: Returns the specified configuration revision for the specified configuration.

parameters.name: ConfigurationId
parameters.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the configuration.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationId
nested_items.description: Required. The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the configuration.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: Required. The date and time of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Data
nested_items.description: Amazon MQ for ActiveMQ: the base64-encoded XML configuration. Amazon MQ for RabbitMQ: base64-encoded Cuttlefish.
